Source code for pcapkit.vendor.hip.transport

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""HIP Transport Modes"""

from pcapkit.vendor.default import Vendor

__all__ = ['Transport']



[docs]class Transport(Vendor):
    """HIP Transport Modes"""

    #: Value limit checker.
    FLAG = 'isinstance(value, int) and 0 <= value <= 3'
    #: Link to registry.
    LINK = 'https://www.iana.org/assignments/hip-parameters/transport-modes.csv'



if __name__ == "__main__":
    Transport()
